titleStmt.title: A mournefull dittie, entituled Elizabeths losse together with a welcome for King Iames. To a pleasant new tune.

notesStmt.note: A song - "Farewell, farewell, farewell, braue Englands ioy:".
Printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
